    • Method Detail

      • canPlaySound

        public boolean canPlaySound​()
        Can this client play sounds?
        Returns:
        True if there is a sound player present.

      • playSound

        public void playSound​(java.lang.String sound)
        Play a sound.
        Parameters:
        sound - The sound resource to play, or if null stop playing.

      • getSoundMixerLabelText

        public java.lang.String getSoundMixerLabelText​()
        Get the label text for the sound player mixer. Needed by the audio mixer option UI.
        Returns:
        The text.
